meta.job_title: VP of Manufacturing Excellence and Engineering

duties_responsibilities.duty: Lead and oversee all manufacturing operations in the US and Canada, optimizing and standardizing processes for excellence.
Manage the capital budget for improvements and investment in new facilities, ensuring cost-effective and efficient initiatives.
Provide leadership and guidance in continuous improvement and reliability across multiple manufacturing plants.
Implement and oversee capital budgets, managing contractors and ensuring adherence to project timelines.
Drive change leadership by integrating and standardizing manufacturing operations for consistency and efficiency.
Preference for candidates with expertise in refrigerated plant operations and ammonia handling.
Prefer candidates with experience in a DSD (Direct Store Delivery) environment, willing to travel extensively for the role.

education_certification.credential: BS degree, MBA preferred in Food or Beverage Manufacturing
